remarks: The partial isomorphism A for a lattice ` K ` is one-to-one in the region under co-atom ` W ` .  Part of Lemma M of [Crawley] p. 120 line 28.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dia11.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dia11.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dia11.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dia11.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dia11N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ ( Y e. B /\ Y .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( I ` X ) = ( I ` Y ) <-> X = Y ) ) $.
